name: Build-A-Bear Workshop, Inc.
description: Build-A-Bear Workshop, Inc. is a global retail company that offers a unique and interactive experience to customers by allowing them to create their own personalized stuffed animals. Founded in 1997 by Maxine Clark in St. Louis, Missouri, the company has revolutionized the toy industry by blending retail with entertainment. Customers, known as 'Guests', can choose from a variety of stuffed animals, customize them with outfits and accessories, and even record personalized messages to create a one-of-a-kind keepsake. Build-A-Bear has expanded its product offerings to include licensed characters and collaborations with popular franchises, appealing to a broad audience of children and collectors alike. The company operates both physical stores and an online platform, ensuring a comprehensive shopping experience. With a focus on customer engagement and creativity, Build-A-Bear continues to innovate through new products and experiences, including workshops, parties, and events that foster community and connection. The company's mission emphasizes the importance of fun and imagination, making it a beloved brand for families around the world.
